importSpotifyPlaylists.description: Import playlists from Spotify, optionally adding them to the account music library.

getTracksFromSpotifyPlaylists.description: Get Soundtrack tracks using Spotify playlist uris.

updateSpotifyPlaylistMetadata.description: Update metadata on playlists imported from Spotify

setSpotifyPlaylistAutoRefreshFrequency.description: Set automatic refresh policy for a playlist

syncSpotifySyncedPlaylist.description: Force a sync between the underlying Spotify Playlist and the `spotify-composer` playlist

spliceManualPlaylist.description: Splices the tracks of a `manual` playlist. This mutation changes the contents of a playlist by removing or replacing existing tracks and/or adding new tracks in place. API inspired by the JS `Array.splice` method.

blockTrack.description: block a track for a sound zone.

unblockTrack.description: unblock a track for a sound zone.

play.description: Start playback for a sound zone.

pause.description: Pause playback for a sound zone.

skipTrack.description: Skip the current playing track for a sound zone.

skipTracks.description: Skip x number of tracks for a playing sound zone.

setVolume.description: Set the volume of a sound zone.

soundZonePairDevice.description: Pair a device to a sound zone using a pairing code.

soundZoneUnpair.description: Unpair a device paired to a sound zone.

soundZoneInitiatePairing.description: Initiate a pairing process for a sound zone.

setPlayFrom.description: Change playback source of a sound zone.

soundZoneCreate.description: Create a sound zone under a location.

soundZoneAssignSource.description: Assign play source to sound zones.

soundZoneQueueTracks.description: Queue tracks to a sound zone.

soundZoneClearQueuedTracks.description: Clear all queued tracks for a sound zone.

soundZoneSetPlaybackOrder.description: Sets the playback order of a sound zone.

soundZoneGenerateRemoteCode.description: Generates a new remote code for the sound zone, used by our remotes.

soundZoneSubmitCancellationReason.description: Submit a cancellation reason for a sound zone.
